description: For 820 years he had slumbered with no knowledge of mankind's advancement and scientific progress. The land which he once knew has become an unfamiliar place with new technology, attitudes, and lifestyles. Upon awakening, Cadis Etrama Di Raizel (aka Rai), seeks to familiarize himself with this era. He locates a loyal servant of his, Frankenstein, who is currently the principal of a South Korean High School. Rai decides that this school is the perfect place to help him learn about the modern world, enrolls, and begins associating with a group of good-natured students in order to 'blend in'. But this new world is no safer than the old; and the dignified, bewildered, technologically inept Rai finds himself embroiled in adventures both ridiculous and dangerous.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Werewolf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a werewolf.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Basketball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of basketball.

node.description: Jae-Ho Son is one of the two creators of Noblesse. He writes the story.
Started off as a production manager at Ad Cosmo.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yasukiti01)

__Hometown:__ Anjo, Aichi Prefecture, Japan

Yasutaka Yamamoto debuted as a storyboard maker and a producer with episode 34 of Idaten Jump (2005) after working as an assistant producer for My Melody (2005) He then worked as an assistant director for The Orphans of Simitra (2008), and debuted as a director with Valkyria Chronicles the following year. Since then, he has worked on many productions as a director, storyboard maker, and producer. Some of these titles include: Actually, I Am… (2015), Hinomaru Sumo (2018), and Nekopara (2020).

_Source: Crunchyroll Expo 2020_

Freelancer with deep ties to [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

[Official Japanese Website](https://jaefans.com/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/jj_1986_jj/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bornfreeonekiss)

Kim Jaejoong is a South Korean singer, songwriter, actor, director and designer. He is best known for being one of the original members of the korean boyband [TVXQ](https://anilist.co/staff/101629/TVXQ) and is currently part of the group JYJ as well as a soloist.

__[Website (EN)](http://ohmy-girl.com/omg_official/)__ | __[Website (JP)](https://ohmygirljapan.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/OHMYGIRLJAPAN)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/wm_ohmygirl/)__

__Formed:__ April, 2015

__Biography:__
Oh My Girl (stylized as OH MY GIRL), alternatively known as OMG, is a Korean idol group under record labels WM Entertainment and Ariola Japan. They made their initial debut in Korea in 2015 as an all-girls idol group. Additionally the group name has its origin in the saying "大衆のマイ・ガールになりたい" (meaning "I want to be a popular My Girl")

__Members:__
- Choi Hyo-Jung (崔效定), alternatively known by stage name Hyojung (ヒョジョン) – leader, lead vocalist
- Kim Mi-Hyun (金美賢), alternatively known by stage name Mimi (ミミ) – rapper
- Yoo Si-a (柳始我), alternatively known by stage name YooA (ユア) – vocalist
- Hyun Seung-Hee (玄勝熙), alternatively known by stage name Seunghee (スンヒ) – lead vocalist
- Bae Yu-Bin (裴洧彬), alternatively known by stage name Binnie (ビニ) – vocalist
- Choi Ye-Won (崔乂園), alternatively known by stage name Arin (アリン) – vocalist

__Former Members:__
- Shin Hye-Jin (申惠眞), alternatively known by stage name JinE (ジニ)
- Kim Ji-Ho (金祉呼), alternatively known by stage name Jiho (ジホ) – vocalist
__Tomoki Nagasaka__ is a Japanese editor who works for post production studio Jay Film.
**Tooru Kanegae** is a Japanese sound production manager.

[Website](http://www.ike-yoshihiro.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ikeyoshihiro)

Yoshihiro Ike is a Japanese composer, music arranger, and bassist. He is best known for scoring and composing music for movies, TV dramas, Anime and video games and has worked on more than 100 titles in the last 20 years.

His debut anime title, [Blood: The Last Vampire](https://anilist.co/anime/405/), was nominated for the 2000 UK Music Awards under the soundtrack category, and subsequently awarded the top prize at the Japan Media Arts Festival in 2001 by the Agency for Cultural affairs. In 2006, his score for [Kamichu!](https://anilist.co/anime/489/) received an Excellence Prize at the 2005 Japan Media Arts Festival. In 2018, Shadowverse original soundtracks became the highest-ranking album on iTunes, surpassing Shallow by Lady Gaga.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/leonardosanthos) | [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/leonardosanthos) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/leonardosanthos) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@FalaCritica) | [Twitch](http://www.twitch.tv/FalaCritica)

- Pierce Wheels (Ben 10: Alien Force)
- Peter "Pete" Devin / Master Carter (BONDiNG)
- Agent Bratcher (Outer Banks)
- Henrich Zemo / Baron Zemo (1st voice; The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes)
- Soren (The Dragon Prince)
- Myst (Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Spartan Jared Miller (Halo 4)
- Tetsuya Fukazawa (Ju-On: Origins)
- Kyd Miller (1st voice - 10th season; The X-Files)
- Onix (Gears of War: Judgement)
